ygData.subject: Re: [SPOILER] [eqbards] Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yup, off the same named gypsy.  A L37 bard was in Mistmoore last night offering to trade an Ebony Blade for the drum.  I m kicking myself for not offering
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 1 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> i am guessing the same person who drops the lute of the gypsy princess,
> though just a guess. i got the lute from the named gypsy in mistmoore
> castle.

Yup, off the same named gypsy. A L37 bard was in Mistmoore
last night offering to trade an Ebony Blade for the drum. I'm
kicking myself for not offering to buy it from my friend (and
he's probably kicking himself for not holding onto it for a
while since he's a ranger and could've used that Ebony Blade).
Oh well, I've alerted all my friends and they're on the
lookout for it for me now.

It's good to know there are special bard "weapons" in the
game. :-)

Why do I get the feeling Mistmoore is going to be camped by
bards this weekend...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
